title: Rich and Hearty Chicken and Chorizo Soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '30g butter', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, cut into 2.5cm chunks', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon garlic salt', 'Black pepper to taste', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '225g fresh chorizo sausage, casings removed, cut into 1.5cm chunks', '1 litre chicken stock', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 green chilli, finely chopped (optional)', '250ml double cream', 'Pinch salt to taste', '115g mild-medium Cheddar, grated', '4 tablespoons grated Parmigiano Reggiano (Parmesan)', '4 tablespoons soured cream, for topping']
